|cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON Plus |cpu1spd = 300 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8306SD; |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8309G; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.8 |pwr_conn = C13 |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is presumed to be the original revision. ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/31525-cisco-rv082-and-rv016-v3-vpn-routers-reviewed ''Cisco RV082 and RV016 v3 VPN Routers Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Like the RV042, the original RV016 and RV082 used an Intel IXP425-266 :processor with 16 MB of flash and 64 and 32 MB of RAM, respectively. : The V3's double the amount of flash and increase RAM :by 8x for the RV082 and 4x for the RV016. 
Model	   CPU	  Freq.  Flash 	RAM 	Switch
Cisco     Cavium   MHz   (MB)   (MB)    Realtek
RV082 v3  CN5020   300	  32	256	RTL8309G, RTL8306SD
RV042 v3  CN5010   300	  32	128	RTL8309G
RV016 v3  CN5020   300	  32	256	RTL8329M
==See also== *Cisco RV082 v3 *[[Cisco RV082 (Linksys)]] *[[Cisco RV042 v3]] *[[Cisco RV042]] (v1) *[[Cisco RV042 (Linksys)]] *[[Cisco RV016 v3]] *[[Cisco RV016 (Linksys)]] [[Category:English Documentation]]
